root.query: "SELECT '".LANG_ESCAPE("permdenied")."' action_error,'0' action_commit,'-1' action_go FROM (SELECT a.id,e.id_usuario id_usuario,d.id_grupo id_grupo FROM ".page2table(getParam("page"))." a LEFT JOIN tbl_registros e ON e.id_aplicacion='".page2id(getParam("page"))."' AND e.id_registro=a.id AND e.first=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_usuarios d ON e.id_usuario=d.id WHERE a.id='".abs(intval(getParam("id")))."') z WHERE NOT ".check_sql(getParam("page"),"delete")

"SELECT '".LANG_ESCAPE("permdenied")."' action_error,'0' action_commit,'-1' action_go FROM (SELECT 1) a WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ".page2table(getParam("page"))." WHERE id='".abs(intval(getParam("id")))."')=0"
